Syntax

UCLASS (MinimalAPI,  
       AutoExpandCategories=(ViewportControls, ViewportLookAndFeel, LevelEditing, SourceControl, Content, Startup),  
       HideCategories=(Object, Options, Grid, RotationGrid), Config=EditorPerProjectUserSettings)  
class UEditorPerProjectUserSettings : public UObject

Variables

  Type Name Description
int32 AssetViewerProfileIndex Per project user settings for which asset viewer profile should be used.
FString AssetViewerProfileName  
uint32: 1 bAllowSelectTranslucent True if user should be allowed to select translucent objects in perspective viewports
bool bAlwaysBuildUAT Always build UAT\UBT before launching the game. It will decrease iteration times if disabled
uint32: 1 bAlwaysGatherBehaviorTreeDebuggerData If enabled, behavior tree debugger will collect its data even when all behavior tree editor windows are closed
uint32: 1 bAnimationReimportWarnings If enabled, will compare an animation's sequence length and curves against the old data and inform the user if something changed
uint32: 1 bAutoloadCheckedOutPackages Color curve: Release->Attack happens instantly Attack holds for AttackHoldPeriod, then Decays from Attack to Sustain for DecayPeriod with DecayExponent, then Sustain holds for SustainHoldPeriod, then Releases from Sustain to Release for ReleasePeriod with ReleaseExponent
uint32: 1 bAutomaticallyHotReloadNewClasses If enabled, any newly added classes will be automatically compiled and trigger a hot-reload of the module they were added to
uint32: 1 bConfirmEditorClose If enabled, you'll be asked to confirm if you really want to close the editor.
uint32: 1 bDisplayActionListItemRefIds If enabled, tooltips on SGraphPaletteItems will show the associated action's string id
uint32: 1 bDisplayBlackboardKeysInAlphabeticalOrder If enabled, blackboard keys displayed in blackboard editor and key selector will be sorted in alphabetical order .
uint32: 1 bDisplayDocumentationLink If enabled, tooltips linked to documentation will show the developer the link bound to that UI item
bool bDisplayEngineVersionInBadge When enabled, Engine Version Number is displayed in the ProjectBadge
uint32: 1 bDisplayUIExtensionPoints ===================================================================== The following options are exposed in the Preferences Editor
bool bEnableSwarmDebugging Enable swarm debugging features. Temp ssf files are not removed. Detailed message printing
bool bGetAttentionOnUATCompletion If enabled, the Editor will attempt to get the users attention whenever a UAT task (such as cooking or packaging) is completed
uint32: 1 bKeepAttachHierarchy If enabled, export level with attachment hierarchy set
uint32: 1 bKeepFbxNamespace If enabled, the fbx parser will keep the fbx namespaces, otherwise the namespace will be append to fbx node.
TObjectPtr< class UBlueprintPaletteFavorites > BlueprintFavorites  
bool bPreviewFeatureLevelActive Is feature level preview currently active
bool bPreviewFeatureLevelWasDefault  
bool bSCSEditorShowFloor  
bool bSCSEditorShowGrid  
uint32: 1 bShowCompilerLogOnCompileError If enabled, the compile message log window will open if there is a compiler error on Hot Reload
uint32: 1 bShowImportDialogAtReimport If enabled, the fbx option dialog will show when user re-import a fbx
uint32: 1 bShowSelectionSubcomponents If this is true, all of an actors' components will be drawn when the actor or one of its component is selected
uint32: 1 bSuppressFullyLoadPrompt If this is true, the user will not be asked to fully load a package before saving or before creating a new object
uint32: 1 bUseCurvesForDistributions Select to make Distributions use the curves, not the baked lookup tables.
bool bUseSimplygonSwarm When enabled, use SimplygonSwarm Module / server to create proxies
FDirectoryPath DataSourceFolder Specify a project data source folder to store relative source file path to ease the re-import process
FName PreviewDeviceProfileName  
int32 PreviewFeatureLevel The feature level we should use when loading or creating a new world
FName PreviewPlatformName The platform name to preview, or NAME_None if there is no preview platform
FName PreviewShaderFormatName The shader format to preview, or NAME_None if there is no preview platform
FName PreviewShaderPlatformName The shader platform to preview, or NAME_None if there is no preview platform
int32 PropertyMatrix_NumberOfPasteOperationsBeforeWarning Controls the minimum value at which the property matrix editor will display a loading bar when pasting values
int32 SCSViewportCameraSpeed How fast the SCS viewport camera moves
FString SimplygonServerIP Server IP for the distributed Simplygon server
uint32 SimplygonSwarmDelay Time between JSON net requests for Simplygon Swarm
FString SwarmIntermediateFolder Folder in which Simplygon Swarm will store intermediate texture and mesh data that is uploaded to the Swarm
uint32 SwarmMaxUploadChunkSizeInMB  
uint32 SwarmNumOfConcurrentJobs Number of concurrent swarm jobs to execute. This is independent of the main job queue.
